attributes.action: Scrap the proposed congestion charging for shrewbsbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been revealed today that a £1 congestion charge has been proposed for traffic entering Shrewsbury town centre. 
I beleive that the council should utilise other options first such as the extension of the bypass before they impose any congestion charge. Congestion charges should only be used as a last resort.
